capabilities.comment: Reserved; To activate following functions, stop in DMX value for at least 3 s and shutter must be closed (except CRI setting) at least 3 sec. („Shutter,Strobe“ channel 37/33 must be at range: 0-31 DMX). Corresponding menu items are temporarily overridden except DMX Input.
DMX input: Wired DMX, *function is active only 10 seconds after switching the fixture on
DMX input: Wireless DMX, *function is active only 10 seconds after switching the fixture on
High CRI / To activate CRI setting, stop in DMX value for at least 3 seconds
Standard CRI / To activate CRI setting, stop in DMX value for at least 3 seconds
Disabled blackout while prism wheel 1 (wheel 2) moving
Lamp On / To activate function, stop in DMX value for at least 3 seconds
Pan/Tilt reset  / To activate function, stop in DMX value for at least 3 seconds
Colour system reset  / To activate function, stop in DMX value for at least 3 seconds
Gobo wheels reset  / To activate function, stop in DMX value for at least 3 seconds
Dimmer/Shutter/Hot Spot reset  / To activate function, stop in DMX value for at least 3 seconds
Zoom/focus/frost/prism reset  / To activate function, stop in DMX value for at least 3 seconds
Effect wheel reset  / To activate function, stop in DMX value for at least 3 seconds
Total reset  / To activate function, stop in DMX value for at least 3 seconds
RoboSpot enabled / The function is only applicable when the RoboSpot is connected.
RoboSpot disabled - except handle faders and pan/tilt  / The function is only applicable when the RoboSpot is connected.
RoboSpot fully disabled  / The function is only applicable when the RoboSpot is connected.

capabilities.effectName: random colour selection by audio control
Auto random colour selection from fast to slow

capabilities.comment: Ramping from open to full position
Ramping from open to half position
Ramp. from half position to full position
